Uses of Interface
org.forgerock.openam.sts.rest.RestSTS

  • Packages that use RestSTS 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.openam.sts.publish.rest  
    org.forgerock.openam.sts.rest
    Contains the classes specific to the REST STS.
    org.forgerock.openam.sts.rest.service  

    • Uses of RestSTS in org.forgerock.openam.sts.publish.rest

      Methods in org.forgerock.openam.sts.publish.rest with parameters of type RestSTS 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String RestSTSInstancePublisher.publishInstance​(RestSTSInstanceConfig instanceConfig, RestSTS instance, boolean republish)
      Publish the Rest STS instance specified by the instanceConfig parameter.
      String RestSTSInstancePublisherImpl.publishInstance​(RestSTSInstanceConfig instanceConfig, RestSTS restSTSInstance, boolean republish)
      Publishes the rest STS instance at the specified relative path.
      void RestSTSInstancePublisher.updateInstanceInCrestRouter​(String stsId, String realm, RestSTSInstanceConfig instanceConfig, RestSTS instance)
      Called by RestSTSPublishServiceListener in response to modify events.
      void RestSTSInstancePublisherImpl.updateInstanceInCrestRouter​(String stsId, String realm, RestSTSInstanceConfig instanceConfig, RestSTS instance)
      The method is synchronized so that two instances are not updated concurrently, as multiple configurations must be completed atomically.
      void RestSTSInstancePublisher.updateInstanceInSMS​(String stsId, String realm, RestSTSInstanceConfig instanceConfig, RestSTS instance)
      Called by RestSTSPublishServiceRequestHandler#handleUpdate, which is ultimately called by the AdminUI when an existing rest-sts instance is edited, or via a programmatic PUT to sts-publish/rest.
      void RestSTSInstancePublisherImpl.updateInstanceInSMS​(String stsId, String realm, RestSTSInstanceConfig instanceConfig, RestSTS instance)
      The method is synchronized primarily as a sanity check, as excluding concurrent updates to published rest-sts instance state makes the system easier to reason about.
